transArray.content: Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. Our hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, with convenient transportation. I'm glad to hear about your positive impression of our hotel in your review. Breakfast has now returned to buffet style, and the menu items are updated from time to time to bring you taste buds and nutritional enjoyment. Thank you for your recognition of us. We will continue to do a good job in all aspects. I believe you will have a better stay experience next time you stay. The hotel looks forward to your visit again and wishes you a happy life!
